ai-kv14.7:1.1_0: The realm of luminous form consists of the form element,
ai-kv14.7:1.3_0: it is precisely because of undertakings the blissful meditation in the present life that is abiding in blissful meditation in the present life belonging to the higher mind, and in the sense that is a single-jhānap. It is the basis for its object.
ai-kv14.7:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.7:1.5_0: Doesn’t necessary for the attainment of blissful meditation in the present life or in one whose mind is not happy in blissful meditation in the present life or in the next life? It is substantial reinforced by a single One, and it is the path of the mind-made body, and its origin.
ai-kv14.7:1.7_0: There’s no offense for one who isn’t belonging to the higher mind in this life. ...
ai-kv14.7:1.8_0: “In the realm of luminous form,” “... the element of form,”
ai-kv14.7:2.1_0: The realm of luminous form consists of the form element,
ai-kv14.7:2.3_0: The sound element, the ear element, the sound element, the smell element, and the taste element.
ai-kv14.7:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.7:2.5_0: The realm of luminous form consists of the form element,
ai-kv14.7:2.9_0: The tangibles of tangibles an element, the touch element, and the thought element.
ai-kv14.7:2.10_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.7:3.5_0: “Having been reborn in the formless realm.”
ai-kv14.7:3.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.7:3.10_0: “That’s how to go about the elements.”

ai-kv14.7:3.14_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv14.7:4.7_0: where there is no offense for one who is reborn.
ai-kv14.7:4.9_0: “Suppose there was an element of sensual desire in the formless realm.”
ai-kv14.7:5.3_0: The sound element, the ear element, the sound element, the smell element, and the taste element.
ai-kv14.7:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv14.7:6.4_0: If you don’t take pleasure in the formless realm, you should say, ‘No.’
ai-kv14.7:6.5_0: Or because of the noble ones. ...
ai-kv14.7:6.9_0: “That’s how to go about the elements.”
ai-kv14.7:6.11_0: If you don’t take pleasure in the formless realm, you should say, ‘No.’
ai-kv14.7:6.12_0: “Surely in the distance of the elements”
ai-kv14.7:6.13_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.7:7.4_0: Regarding sensual desire with the realm of sensual desire, the realm of luminous element,
ai-kv14.7:7.6_0: Currently sensual desire comes to be reborn in the realm of sensual desire. The elements proceed having caught up in the sensual realm.
ai-kv14.7:7.8_0: The discussion on the way is finished.
